!Officer Tepios: I will tell you about the area you will enter and what you must do there. The Hall of Suffering consists of 5 consecutive rooms. Each room has a *Tumor of Death* guarded by various monsters. You must *deactivate* this Tumor. Once you have done so, it will become a *Destroyed Tumor*. Of course, the monsters will try to stop you. Once the Tumors in all 5 rooms are deactivated, you may proceed. But I leave it up to you wherher to face the monsters or the Tumors first. Remember, even if you destroy the Tumor, the nearbly monsters won't simply disappear. [Quest _694_BreakThroughTheHallOfSuffering 32603-03.htm|Keep listerning.]
